title: SOLD: Rose Postcard Mordecai Brown Error (Buster Brown)
author: calvindog

posts.post_title: SOLD: Rose Postcard Mordecai Brown Error (Buster Brown)
posts.post_content:
Rarely seen error Rose PC of Mordecai Brown with Buster Brown of the Philadelphia Phillies' name.  Just four total graded by PSA and SGC combined; this is one of the rarest Mordecai Brown cards in existence.  PM or email me if interested. 

[url=https://flic.kr/p/8kya81][img]https://farm5.staticflickr.com/4120/4815785066_4bb42aaa06_z.jpg[/img][/url]
Nice, congrats.  That was a phat card.  I went back and forth all evening about lobbing in an "i'll take it", but timing was a bit touch coming of REA.  Great card.
